Posts.Content: Welcome Liz to the site, you will find it very helpful, and you can drop in and chat in the chat room anytime. Good luck with rest of radios. Take care and get plenty of rest. Maria xx
Posts.Title: Breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi maureen i finished radiotherapy june 2007 and still get pain and itching in my breast so i think its quite normal. Take care Maria xx
